name: oliverklee/onetimeaccount
description: Allow users to create a one-time FE account to which they will be automatically logged in (without having to enter a user name or password).

ci:coverage:functional: find 'Tests/Functional' -wholename '*Test.php' | parallel --gnu 'echo; echo "Running functional test suite {}"; .Build/vendor/bin/phpunit -c .Build/vendor/typo3/testing-framework/Resources/Core/Build/FunctionalTests.xml --whitelist Classes --coverage-php=".Build/coverage/{}.cov" {}';
scripts.ci:php:lint: find .*.php *.php Classes Configuration Tests -name '*.php' -print0 | xargs -r -0 -n 1 -P 4 php -l
ci:tests:functional: find 'Tests/Functional' -wholename '*Test.php' | parallel --gnu 'echo; echo "Running functional test suite {}"; .Build/vendor/bin/phpunit -c .Build/vendor/typo3/testing-framework/Resources/Core/Build/FunctionalTests.xml {}';
docs:generate: docker run --rm t3docs/render-documentation show-shell-commands > tempfile.sh; echo 'dockrun_t3rd makehtml' >> tempfile.sh; bash tempfile.sh; rm tempfile.sh

scripts-descriptions.ci:coverage: Generates the code coverage report for unit and functional tests.
scripts-descriptions.ci:coverage:functional: Generates the code coverage report for functional tests.
scripts-descriptions.ci:coverage:merge: Merges the code coverage reports for unit and functional tests.
scripts-descriptions.ci:coverage:unit: Generates the code coverage report for unit tests.
scripts-descriptions.ci:php:cs-fixer: Checks the code style with the PHP Coding Standards Fixer (PHP-CS-Fixer).
scripts-descriptions.ci:php:lint: Lints the PHP files for syntax errors.
scripts-descriptions.ci:php:sniff: Checks the code style with PHP_CodeSniffer (PHPCS).
scripts-descriptions.ci:php:stan: Checks the PHP types using PHPStan.
scripts-descriptions.ci:static: Runs all static code checks (syntax, style, types).
scripts-descriptions.coverage:create-directories: Creates the directories needed for recording and merging the code coverage reports.
scripts-descriptions.fix: Runs all automatic code style fixes.
scripts-descriptions.fix:php: Runs all fixers for the PHP code.
scripts-descriptions.fix:php:cs: Fixes the code style with PHP-CS-Fixer.
scripts-descriptions.fix:php:sniff: Fixes the code style with PHP_CodeSniffer.
scripts-descriptions.phpstan:baseline: Updates the PHPStan baseline file to match the code.
scripts-descriptions.prepare-release: Removes development-only files in preparation of a TER release.
